p: Phytochemicals, such as polyphenols, act as antioxidants, modulate LDL oxidation [ 130], and also exert anti-inflammatory, antiplatelet [ 131] and antiviral activity [ 132]. Resveratrol, is an inhibitor of SARS-CoV-1 [ 133] and curcumin was recently reported to bind to the target receptors of SARS-CoV-2 [ 134]. In addition, curcumin combined with vitamin C glycyrrhizic acid promotes interferons production and has immunomodulatory properties [ 135]. Luteolin binds to the surface spike protein of SARS-Cov-2 inhibiting in this way its entry into cells and it is a potential inhibitor of SARS-CoV-2â€™s main protease (SARS-CoV 3CL) [ 136]. Moreover, lignans exhibit antiviral activity [ 137].
